main event: A private citizen observed a bright, round, glowing object in the sky on December 6, 1960.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 30 seconds and moved in a westerly direction before descending behind trees., The observer estimated the object to be 3-5 degrees in apparent diameter and about 20-30 degrees above the horizon., The object emitted a bright, white light that illuminated the surrounding area., The sighting lasted for about 5-10 minutes before it slowly faded from view., No sound was associated with the object during its observation.
sighted object: a bright, circular object emitting white light
